description: A large house in the forest on Mt. Colubo, serving as the hideout and home of the Dadan Family mountain bandits. This is where Garp arranged for both Ace and Luffy to be raised during their childhood.

keyEvents.title: Dadan's House Debut
keyEvents.description: Garp brings young Luffy to Dadan's house where he meets Ace for the first time.
keyEvents.significance: The home where Luffy and Ace's brotherhood began, serving as their childhood base.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Meets Ace at Dadan's House
keyEvents.description: The first meeting between young Luffy and Ace takes place at Dadan's house.
keyEvents.significance: The location where one of the series' most important relationships begins.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as the Dadan Family's hideout and home

description: A massive junkyard located on Dawn Island, just outside the great gate of Goa Kingdom. Filled with unwanted goods and people ejected from the city, it is a lawless community without proper medical care, ravaged by disease and crime. The trash smells from burning in the sun.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Discovers Gray Terminal
keyEvents.description: After following Ace for three months through dangerous terrain, Luffy finally reaches Gray Terminal, discovering where Ace has been going every day.
keyEvents.significance: Gray Terminal becomes a crucial location where Luffy, Ace, and Sabo will form their brotherhood and where major events of the flashback arc will unfold.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning as Goa Kingdom's junkyard and home to outcasts

description: A heavily-forested mountain on Dawn Island that rests behind Foosha Village. Home to the Dadan Family mountain bandits and the location where both Luffy and Ace were raised and conducted their training under Garp's arrangement.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Follows Ace Through Mt. Colubo
keyEvents.description: Young Luffy follows Ace through the dangerous forests of Mt. Colubo for three months, facing crocodiles, wild tigers, bears, and venomous snakes.
keyEvents.significance: The mountain serves as the training ground where Luffy proves his determination to befriend Ace.

statusHistory.reason: Natural mountain location on Dawn Island
